column1: # Feed properties database for crops and food byproducts used as animal feed
#   - digestibility: fraction of feed converted to animal product (0-1)
#   - ME_MJ_per_kg_DM: Metabolizable energy in MJ per kg dry matter
#   - CP_pct_DM: Crude protein as percentage of dry matter
#   - NDF_pct_DM: Neutral detergent fiber as percentage of dry matter
# Digestibility values are MOCK and should be replaced with actual feed conversion efficiencies
